ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of agriculture on this new world. Allows the growing of new crops which are native to this planet. Unlocks the ability to cultivate corn, rice and strawberries. Unlocks the secret of hydroponic gardening. Also unlocks fences to keep those pesky critters away from your crops!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vegetables Research I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of some basic vegetables and plants, such as carrots and onions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vegetables Research II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture enables the ability for your colonists to grow new vegetables and plants, such as lettuce and eggplants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Vegetables Research III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new vegetables and plants, such as beans and pumpkins.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fruits Research I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of different fruits, such as cloudberry and gooseberry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fruits Research II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow blueberries

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fruits Research III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new fruits and plants, such as strawberry and tomatoes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cereals Research I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of different cereals, such as oats.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cereals Research II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow corn and wheat.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cereals Research III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new cereals, such as rice.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Orchards cultivation I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of amazing orchards, consist of oranges and peaches.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Orchards cultivation II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow grape and bananas.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Orchards cultivation III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new orchard trees, such as apples.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Trees cultivation I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of bamboo and cecropia trees for lumber.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Trees cultivation II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow birches and poplars.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Trees cultivation III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow new trees, such as oaks, pines and teaks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fiber agriculture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of fiber crops, such as cotton and building Fabric Hamper for tailoring.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fiber agriculture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow devilstrand.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fiber agriculture III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow hevea trees.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medical agriculture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of xerigium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medical agriculture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in medical agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow aloe.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medical agriculture III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in medical agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow hypericum, mint and wild rose, but only in Hydroponic Basins.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tropical cultivation I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of sugarcane.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tropical cultivation II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow cocoa.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tropical cultivation III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in agriculture gives your colonists the ability to grow coffee and tea. Also unlocks Coffee Table for making some hot drinks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Drugs research I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing some drug plants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flowers cultivation I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of simple flowers: Astralagus, Crocus, Venus, Rosebay and Dandelion. Also your colonists may build Plant Pot now.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flowers cultivation II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of more simple flowers: White rose, Daylily and Delphinium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flowers cultivation III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture and flowers gives your colonists the ability to grow beautiful roses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Animal husbandry I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the building of Animal Sleeping Box and growing hay for some domestic animals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Animal husbandry II
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows your colonists to build a Silage (Brewery), so they can refine hops, berries, rice, agave, and corn into tasty Wort, wine, saki, tequila, and whisky.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Animal husbandry III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colonists to build Animal Beds for their pets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fishing I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colonists to build Fishing Pier near deep water for fishing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fishing II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows your colonists to build Aquaculture Basin for growing fish.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Soil fertillization I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture give your colonists the ability to fertilize the soil and make Rich Soil tiles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Soil fertillization II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Even further advancements in agriculture give your colonists the ability to fertilize the soil and make Tilled Soil tiles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bridges
ResearchProjectDef.description: Mind the gap or use a bridge to cross it. Enables your colonists to place foundations in shallow water. On these you can place bridges or platforms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Terraforming
ResearchProjectDef.description: Time to get your feet wet or the ones of your enemies. A work intensive time awaits your colonists if they want to form the planet to their needs. Unlocks the potential to place water or floors anywhere. Enables your colonists to fill deep water holes to shallow ones and build there.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Compost production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build Fertilizer Production.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Soil fertillization III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced knowledge of this planet's environment gives your colonists the ability to terraform. This unlocks the Fertilizer Pump and Moisture Pump which allows you to slowly create farmable soil anywhere.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Indoor farming
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn all what you need about growing your plants indoor! Unlocks the Sun Lamp.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hydroponics I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Increased familiarity with the planet's environment unlocks the secret of hydroponic gardening. This allows your colonists to build the hydroponic basin to allow for indoor gardening.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hydroponics II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the secret of advanced hydroponic gardening with Advanced Hydroponic Basin.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fungi I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Research how to adapt the hydroponics tables to grow cave plants, such as champignon and glowbuld. Also unlocks Fungiponics Basin for them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fungi II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of shimmershrooms on your Fungiponics Basins.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fungi III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the growing of gleamcap on your Fungiponics Basins.
